column1: Digital Hospitality and Travel Leadership - MSc
column3: London Geller College of Hospitality and Tourism
column5: The global tourism industry is the seventh fastest-growing industry in the world, with the hospitality sector alone worth £2.5 trillion to the global economy.This course has been developed in consultation with the industry and offers a fascinating insight into the continuously changing arena of digital hospitality and travel services.Finding the connections between leadership and digital disruption is not easy and involves a radical transformation of organisations in the sector. These three key themes - leadership, digital disruption and transformation - form the foundation for this course.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
